rules.natural: Provided that the conservation agency has adequate field staff, it can patrol the research region.
Whenever animal behavior is altered in the research region, animal migration becomes disrupted there.
In the case that the animal population is healthy in the research region, endangered species are stable there.
Should the ecosystem be balanced in the research region, biodiversity is high there.
Given that the ecosystem is balanced in the research region, habitat quality is good there.
Provided that biodiversity is high in the research region, the animal population is healthy there.
If the conservation agency has implemented a conservation plan, then if the conservation agency has not achieved its goals, human-animal conflict exists in the research region.
Provided that the conservation agency has deployed a research team, data collection is ongoing in the research region.

Whenever the conservation agency has submitted field reports, then if data collection is ongoing in the research region, then either the conservation agency has adequate funding, or if it has authorization for the research region, then it achieves its conservation goals.

If the conservation agency has operational remote sensing, then if data collection is ongoing in the research region, then either the conservation agency has adequate funding, or if it has authorization for the research region, then it achieves its conservation goals.

Provided that conservation expertise is available to the conservation agency, it has implemented a conservation plan.
Should the conservation agency have sufficient conservation resources, then it has adequate operational capacity.
